name: ✰♛𝐑𝐎𝐘𝐀𝐋♛✰➳🖤⃝⚔️𝐃𝐎𝐋𝐋𝐘🖤⃝⚔️
description: A Telegram Music Bot written in Python using Pyrogram and Py-Tgcalls

API_ID.description: Telegram app id, get it from https://my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: Telegram app hash, get it from https://my.telegram.org/apps

PYROGRAM_SESSION.description: Pyrogram session string, get it from @SESSIONGENERATOR_ROBOT

SUDO_USERS.description: ID of sudo users who have special access (separate multiple ids with space)

PREFIX.description: Bot commad prefix or handler (separate multiple prefix with space). By DefaultU Can Set <$>

LANGUAGE.description: An available bot language (read the README.md for more info)

CUSTOM_QUALITY.description: An available stream quality (read the README.md for more info)
